name: Brainy Mummy Rush
description:
An ancient curse awakened a pharaoh from his slumber...

He must eat, he must live. But beware of Anubis! He will not stop until you return to the Duat! Where you belong...

Controls: Arrow keys or WASD to move

Get as much points as you can!

GameJam 2022 - GameDevTV ----Theme: Death is only the beginning
